faq.label: FAQs
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We work with verified partners, distributors, and retail networks to ensure transparent and compliant market entry.

accordions.question: Can I upgrade from Standard to Premium later?
accordions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to Premium at any time.

accordions.question: How long does the approval process take?
accordions.answer: The approval process typically takes 2-3 business days.

accordions.question: Are non-food products allowed?
accordions.answer: Yes, non-food categories can participate under applicable requirements. Typically 7–14 business days after application submission. Yes, participants can upgrade after initial approval. Customs consultation is included in the Premium package.

accordions.question: Do you provide customs support?
accordions.answer: Yes, we provide customs support for  participants
